spell.tubois_druidry.fertilize.guide: Hold to cast a cone of natural energy, causing plants and soil caught within the cone to rapidly sprout and grow.
ui.tubois_druidry.boombloom_error_target: Cast bloomboom at the root of a flower!
ui.tubois_druidry.boombloom_error_occupi: A boombloom has already been placed at this location!
death.attack.tubois_druidry.boombloom: %1$s stepped on %2$s's boombloom and was annihilated
